# 実装例

## e1071package

```{r}
data(iris)
nb <- naiveBayes(Species ~ ., data = iris)
nb
str(nb)

table(predict(nb,iris[,-5]),iris[,5])
```


#アルゴリズム

```{r}
methods(naiveBayes)
getS3method("naiveBayes", "default")
methods(predict)
getS3method("predict", "naiveBayes")
```
